SELECT s.id, sss.school_name, s.province, SUBSTR(s.city,1,2) city, s.type, case when s.nature=36000 then '公办' when s.nature = 36001 then '民办' when s.nature = 36002 then '中外合作' else '其他' end nature, case when s.school_type=6000 then '本科' when s.school_type=6001 then '专科' else '其他' end school_type, s.f985, s.f211, s.dual_class, ss.year, ss.min_score, ss.min_cha, ss.min_score_order, s.badge_url from school_score_selector as sss left join school_score as ss on sss.id = ss.sss_id LEFT JOIN school AS s ON s.NAME = sss.school_name where sss.province_name = #{provinceName} and curriculum = #{curriculum} and sss.batch_name = #{batchName} and year in #{item}
and (min_score IS NOT NULL AND min_score_order IS NOT NULL AND min_cha IS NOT NULL)
